channel.title: Need help with The Npcs xD
channel.description: Well this is a weird situation I have no errors or anything related to that i just cant f*cking find 'Captain Donnie' Or The 'Adventurer' in the Npc list.. Anyone?

item.title: Need help with The Npcs xD
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Yeah thats the problem.

I want to change the Npc model -.-’ I dont want the adventurer (4960) he does not look so well.
The real problem is: The adventurer has some Dialogues. Example : “How are you today”
Now i just want to move the Dialogues to Party Pete How am i able to do that?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with The Npcs xD

item.title: Need help with The Npcs xD
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

probably custom npcs/renamed npss check your enitydef in client files

if you have adventurer or whatever already spawned somewhere you could always go to the spawn config, get the id, go from there…

Read full topic
